discourse_list.title: Help improve the Maker community portal \xe2\x80\x93 5 minute survey

content.content: Have you ever visited the Maker community development portal or thought about being more active in the Maker community? I’m working on improving the content structure and information architecture of the community-development platform. And I’d like to understand what tasks/resources are most important to you when you’re using the portal (or thinking about it). If you have  5 minutes  to spare today, I’d super appreciate it if you could fill out this 2 question survey:    Google Docs    Maker Community-dev site Choose the 5 most important tasks/resources to you when using or thinking about using the community development portal: https://community-development.makerdao.com/  1) Choose only 5 2) Don't spend longer than 5 minutes on this survey – we want a gut...      Thanks in advance.
I did submit mine hope it will help to get a little bit of Business Intelligence !
